Title: 41148 - # Reasons a Cell Phone Camera Will Never Replace a Digital Camera
Direction:
675 words. Write about four to eight reasons why a cell phone camera will never outdo the traditional digital camera. Film cameras have gone by the wayside and the cell phone camera hastened their demise. But the cell phone camera will never be able to overtake the digital camera. Professional and amateur photographers still use digital cameras to get the best possible images, so you'll appeal to the crowd that wants to up their photography skills and get away from the cell phone camera. Your target audience is tech-minded. Consider anchoring the client URL to a sentence that discusses how technology keeps adding functions to digital cameras that were once never thought of.
Please make sure you link to other products in this article to make the Sony link less obvious. However, make sure that none of the products you link to are competitors of Sony.
Anchor Text: best digital camera branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: advancements in the best digital camera

Title: 41157 - # Reasons to Use Earbuds Safely and How to Do It
Direction: 675 words. Write four to eight reasons to use earbuds safely and how to use them to minimize the possibility of hearing loss. Earbuds have the potential to cause hearing loss early on, due to their direct feed into the eardrums. It's a known problem, but many people don't stop to consider how to use them safely. Appeal to all ages in order to help them preserve their hearing while still enjoying their music. Your target audience is interested in information about technology. Consider discussing the use of noise canceling earbuds as one way to reduce volume while maintaining audio clarity, to link to your target URL. Please make sure you link to other products in this article (if possible and natural) to make the Sony link less obvious. However, make sure that none of the products you link to are competitors of Sony.
Anchor Text: sound canceling earbuds unrelated keyword (this could be “more information”, “click here”,
Extra Writer Notes: Example AT: click here for more informatiom
